definition.featurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="feature_container" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><value name="feature"><block type="feature_tree_simple"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="type">acacia</field><field name="base_height">6</field><field name="height_variation_a">4</field><field name="height_variation_b">1</field><field name="force_dirt">TRUE</field><field name="ignore_vines">TRUE</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This block represents a fancy oak tree, and should generate during the VEGETAL_DECORATION stage.</comment><value name="dirt"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Felsandstone</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block that will be placed under the trunk</comment></block></value><value name="trunk"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:PyrindLog</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block used for the trunk</comment></block></value><value name="foliage"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:PyrindLeaves</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block used for the leaves</comment></block></value><value name="root_placer"><block type="root_placer_none"></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_rarity"><field name="rarity">4</field><next><block type="placement_heightmap"><field name="heightmap">MOTION_BLOCKING</field><next><block type="placement_in_square"><next><block type="placement_block_survival_filter"><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.FIRE</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
